description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in RoboSoft Photo Gallery, Images, Slider in Rbs Image Gallery allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Photo Gallery, Images, Slider in Rbs Image Gallery: from n/a through 3.2.17.
